Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell viability assay and Western blot

Material used.Material Name: HEK293 cells transfected with LRRK2 constructs
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells transfected with wild-type or mutant LRRK2 constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: The I2020T mutant showed reduced protective effects against hydrogen peroxide-induced apoptosis compared to the wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 expression construct was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Analysis of variance (ANOVA) and Student's t-test were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
